example

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • example.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    A robot can carry one box at a time and can put it on a bellt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Robot()
      Initially a robot carrys no box

      boolean carryBox()
      returns true iff this robot is carrying a box

      Main method
      void putOn(ConveyerBelt belt)
      this robot puts the box it is carrying on the belt, message is displaid if it is not possible to put the box on the belt
      void take(Box box)
      this robot takes a box of it is not already acrrying one

      • take

        public void take(Box box)
        this robot takes a box of it is not already acrrying one
        Parameters:
        box - the taken box
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this robot is already carrying a box

      • putOn

        this robot puts the box it is carrying on the belt, message is displaid if it is not possible to put the box on the belt
        Parameters:
        belt - the belt where to put the carrying belt
